headline: Show HN: 10x your analysis performance with this data platform (5 min video)
description: Hi HN! I’ve made this introduction video to the data platform we’re making at Convier (https://convier.no). The target audiences are potential users, customers, IT-departments, and investors, and I would love feedback about what we can do to improve the presentation. It is meant to be put on our website, as well as posted on other social media.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 用这个数据平台将你的分析性能提高10倍（5分钟视频）
